itunes:title: Episode 358 - DB Sports Companion Show 12/18/18 - Fantasy Football Championship Week(s)
title: Episode 358 - DB Sports Companion Show 12/18/18 - Fantasy Football Championship Week(s)
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway pick all the NFL spreads and break down Super Bowl teams in Fantasy Football as Ross calls the team owners vying for championships in the Drinkin' Sports leagues.  They also call for an end to ESPN's week 17 matchups, and ...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway pick all the NFL spreads and break down Super Bowl teams in Fantasy Football as Ross calls the team owners vying for championships in the Drinkin' Sports leagues.  They also call for an end to ESPN's week 17 matchups, and why the Chiefs, Chargers, and Rams might sit all of their starters week 17.  Ross wants to burn a Notre Dame jersey live of Facebook.
